text: Oscar Acosta may refer to: * Oscar Zeta Acosta (1935–1974), American attorney, politician, novelist and activist * Oscar Acosta (baseball) (1957–2006), American baseball player and pitching coach * Oscar Román Acosta (born 1964), Argentine football midfielder * Oscar Acosta Zeledon (1933-2014), Honduran poet and narrator
title: Oscar Acosta
